paper_metadata.title: Sustainable livelihoods through partnership and appropriate technology: The case of the rubble removal project in Gaza

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The main objective of this research is to explore the interplay between partnership and the appropriate technology poverty alleviation approach in a post-conflict context towards sustainable livelihoods
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Using a qualitative dominant approach, primary data were collected through interviews with key informants and a project survey using a questionnaire

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: primary data were collected through interviews with key informants and a project survey using a questionnaire

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Several projects were proposed including the rubble removal project to achieve this target
evidence_citations.country_citation: Gaza experienced an Israeli-Palestinian armed conflict in 2008-2009
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: The local authorities prepared plans for reconstruction to restore the living environment for the affected population
